author: anmenaga
body:
-SMAOnly flag does Not work when building using Start-PSBuild.

Steps to reproduce
------------------
`Start-PSBuild -SMAOnly`

Expected behavior
-----------------
Build successful.

Actual behavior
---------------
Error:

> Assets file 'System.Management.Automation\obj\project.assets.json' doesn't have a target for '.NETCoreApp,Version=v2.0/win10-x64'
